desc: You carefully walk across the new bridge
You see a red hot stone, you can feel the warmth from here
The gate is wide open, the thick doors make it impossible to break it
You see pretty purple berries, you recall something about poison. Best not eat them
Ack! You feels something cold on your shoulder! Oh wait it just a vine
The vegetation looks devastated from what you did to it
The vegetation looks devastated from what you did to it
The vegetation looks devastated from what you did to it
The vegetation looks devastated from what you did to it
An oasis, a beautify little flower grows here
A door to a once mighty ship, you wonder how it got stranded here
You see a very pretty teal stone
